opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Blackwater Security Consulting, LLC v. Nordan

opinion:
127 S.Ct. 1381 (2007)

BLACKWATER SECURITY CONSULTING, LLC, et al., petitioners,
v.
Richard P. NORDAN, et al.

No. 06-857.

Supreme Court of United States.

February 26, 2007.

Motion of American International Group, Inc. for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
